about_the_game:
Take a bold first step into the world of Albion with exclusive gear and avatars, plus 2,500 Gold and 30 extra days of Premium status. Travel the world in style in an exclusive armor set, and update your profile with exclusive Epic avatars.

The Epic Pack includes:
  • 30 Additional Days of Premium Status
  • 2,500 Gold
  • Exclusive Epic Avatars
  • Exclusive Epic Armor (hat, tunic, and boots)

Note: as with all items in the game, the items included in this pack are lootable and destructible. Store them in a chest until you're ready to use them!
detailed_description:
Take a bold first step into the world of Albion with exclusive gear and avatars, plus 2,500 Gold and 30 extra days of Premium status. Travel the world in style in an exclusive armor set, and update your profile with exclusive Epic avatars.

The Epic Pack includes:
  • 30 Additional Days of Premium Status
  • 2,500 Gold
  • Exclusive Epic Avatars
  • Exclusive Epic Armor (hat, tunic, and boots)

Note: as with all items in the game, the items included in this pack are lootable and destructible. Store them in a chest until you're ready to use them!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 - 18.04 LTS 64 bit or SteamOS (other distributions may work, but are not officially supported)
  • Processor: Intel/AMD CPU with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with OpenGL 3.3 support or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: SDL2: libsdl2-2.0-0
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 - 18.04 LTS 64 bit or SteamOS (other distributions may work, but are not officially supported)
  • Processor: Intel/AMD CPU with SSE2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with OpenGL 3.3 support or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: SDL2: libsdl2-2.0-0

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel/AMD CPU with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with OpenGL 3.3 support or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel/AMD CPU with SSE2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with OpenGL 3.3 support or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

name: Epic Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8 or 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel/AMD CPU with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DirectX 10 support or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel/AMD CPU with SSE2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DirectX 10 support or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Take a bold first step into the world of Albion with exclusive gear and avatars, plus 2,500 Gold and 30 extra days of Premium status.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Russian
*languages with full audio support
